summary: Fixed 502 Bad Gateway error on currentmesh.com. Marketing site had crashed due to memory issues. Restarted marketing service and reloaded Nginx. Site is now responding (200 OK). Marketing site still compiling initial pages but Nginx can proxy requests successfully.
current_status: All services running: server (port 3000), marketing (port 3001), app (port 5000), client (port 5001), admin (port 5002). Nginx configured correctly. Marketing site compiling but accessible. 502 error resolved.
